column5: Who is this clown?  Personal Message Johnybegood  View Member Profile Add as Friend Send Message Add to PM block list Forward PM Find Member's Topics Find Member's Posts  Incredible Fly Fishing, Today, 04:58 AM   Newbie   Group: Members Posts: 0 Member No.: 2,549 Joined: Today, 04:44 AM    What you need for Fly Fishing! Visit - Link deleted!
not sure i got it too!
Got one also, but from Incredible Fly Fishing. I see he's deleted now. Good work Mods.
Damn!! You mean I shouldn't have sent $500 for that awsome fly in trip for 2 to a remote river for the "World's best flyfishing"?  Oh well...
DO NOT OPEN THE WEBSITE IT IS A TROJAN VIRUS THAT WAS BLOCKED BY MY COMPUTER.  Art
YES, I was also spammed with a TOJAN HORSE ! ! !   Good thing my McAfee software STOPPED it and removed it.  DON'T OPEN THAT FILE GUYS ! ! ! ! ! !

Dang, thought I actually had a valid PM there for a moment.  Never a good idea to click on links supplied in unsolicited emails or PM’s.  I delete everything TJ sends me by mail for this reason….You never know what he has included in his always late newsletters.  The IP addy instead of a URL should have been a dead giveaway…
HEY!!!  Im working on it... be careful or Ill raise my subscription rates...
go ahead and double them no want lets triple them that will show them bud.  Art

I also got one but not form this forum. Mine came from the Ice Fishing Chat Forum. It appears that it is targeting recent posters. Like any unsolicited sales pitch I just deleted it. Warnings on this scam is also on other boards.  Best Wishes: Rick
what happens now i opened it

Me Too!! I knew I shouldn't have but I'm always a curious one so I went to the site. The page was blank and my comp froze so I did an enmergency shut down!! By holding the "ON" button to shut it down quick as possible instead of yanking the power plug out of the wall. That would have been my next choice.  dsn
I clicked the link from work and the network filter chomped down on that one immediately.
I would suggest that you run a virus checker, adaware and malware detection program to eliminate the virus.
Thank you for looking after this problem. Much appreciated. Thanks Dan
